context_bundle.summary: Git branching strategies: Git Flow (feature/develop/release/hotfix branches), GitHub Flow (main + feature branches), Trunk-Based Development (short-lived branches, frequent merges). Choose based on team size, release cadence, deployment frequency.

onboarding.quick_start: Git branching: Git Flow (complex, release-focused), GitHub Flow (simple, continuous deployment), Trunk-Based (minimal branches, CI/CD). Feature branches merge to main/develop. Hotfix for production bugs. Choose strategy based on deployment frequency and team size.
common_patterns: Git Flow: main, develop, feature/*, release/*, hotfix/*
GitHub Flow: main + feature branches only
Trunk-Based: main + short-lived feature branches (<1 day)
